website_summaries.verdict: Ultra modern entryway bench with a mix of metal and leather.
pros: The metal framing keeps the bench from flexing and twisting when people sit down
cons: Leather can scratch and tear in homes with pets

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Can not believe a $100 piece of furniture could be of such good, sturdy quality. Honestly, we spent $500 at a local furniture store for another bench in ,aster bedroom but for the guest room, we decided to “cheap out.” But we were amazed at how this could be so good and inexpensive. Assembly a snap as well. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful piece for the entry way.
customer_reviews.text: Love the contemporary design. It's super easy to assemble, great quality! Now all my guests can come in, sit down on this sturdy bench and take off their shoes with style ;)
customer_reviews.author: P. Liew

customer_reviews.title: White decor
customer_reviews.text: Luv the white bench n was easy to assemble and very well wrapped
customer_reviews.author: yvette jolyn eberly

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary Furniture is Hard to Find.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench to go at the end of my queen size bed. It fits perfectly and is well made. It is the color and style I was looking for. Packaging was well done; assembly was not a problem. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: TGBShops

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bench for the end of my bed, but......
customer_reviews.text: It’s not completely white and that is why only 4 stars. I’m going for a “Miami white” simple decour. This is a modern, classy piece of furniture. Does the trick. I don’t care if it’s not real leather seat, just wish it were as white as my bed frame. All good, I’m happy and didn’t break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Soul Sauce

customer_reviews.title: It's a Decent Bench!
customer_reviews.text: After a few follow up emails the company followed through and sent me the missing foot bumpers. Everything is tight but still wobbles a little bit; but acceptable for price point. I get compliments and works as both a small coffee table and extra seating when needed in my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: We like everything about it. Great value, solid construction, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this piece
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this piece, great price, I recently bought a bedroom set furniture and I did not want to pay what they were asking at the store for a bench, I knew I could do better looking at Amazon and I did. It looks amazing along with my new furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Janaina Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble because.....
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble because they included the wrong size of Allen wrench. I had one that worked but made me wonder if this was a return or a "second". Packed with flimsy thin sheets of styrofoam which had been smashed into a thousand pieces. The bench seems to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: bp2860

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench was super easy to assemble ! I assembled it easily in about 15 min & I LOVE the way that it looks in my Florida home ! Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Mirgos

customer_reviews.title: Modern and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bench. Looks great and it's sturdy. Perfect size for hallways. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction and shoddy
customer_reviews.text: Very shoddy, metal had small areas of rust upon arrival. Legs were bent so it wobbles when put together. I unfortunately didn't notice either of these until after I put the entire thing together. So returning it is too much effort. I put a towel under one of the corner legs to stabilize it . This is not a quality made piece.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Berman

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The bench looks great and easy to put together. I had it for about 9 months and it finally bent and collapsed. Structure is not strong. My husband and I used it in our closet to put on and take off our shoes. Both of us are normal weight. Needs to be a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful bench.
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful bench ...very comfortable and very sturdy. Very well made. Good solid polished stainless steel. Easy to put together. It was just the right length. The white is elegant. Thanks Ed
customer_reviews.author: EDGAR HENDERSON

customer_reviews.title: It fits the Purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is used for an entryway bench. It does not set level but we will keep it. Some others noted this very thing and should be addressed by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a luxury item
customer_reviews.text: I use this bench at my Ikea makeup vanity and I love it. It's super high quality and looks luxe in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Paepin Katz Starr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!!! Much bigger than I anticipated and easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and missing 4th screw. Wobbles a little. Not as sturdy. Can’t figure out how to get a hold of the company to get the 4th bolt/screw to put into bench.
customer_reviews.author: NamasteBree

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase, meets all my needs and is very beautiful in my entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed defect Product
customer_reviews.text: Came on time But had a defect both sides are not even on the ground so it shakes when put together no way to fix this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I have this bench in my office! I love it I need another one for my closet!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellye jackson

product_meta.title: Cortesi Home Zio Contemporary Metal Entryway X- Bench in Leather Like Vinyl, White
product_meta.description: Color:White VinylThe Zio metal bench has a modern eye-catching design and fits perfectly into existing home decor. This decorative bench features contemporary square tufting and a trestle x-frame design. Upholstered in a white faux leather and contrasted with a high gloss chrome finish. Has seating capacity for two people and is perfect for an entryway or bedroom bench. Dimensions: 39"W x 18.5"L x 18"H
feature_bullets: Upholestered in white leather like vinyl
2 person seating capacity is ideal for residential or commerical spaces

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
